issue_title: [Enhancement] 添加 __hash__ 方法支持 Todo 作为字典键或集合元素

triage_summary.root_cause: Todo class uses @dataclass(slots=True) with eq=True, making objects unhashable by default
triage_summary.fix_approach: Add __hash__ and __eq__ methods based on id field
risk_points: Todos with same id but different content are now considered equal
Hash is stable based on id which never changes
